name: Red Colony 3
summary:
It's here, the final chapter in a series that has taken you across the solar system and had you battle it out against zombies, dinosaurs and now even robots!
In Red Colony 3, You play as Mina, an android, who is returning to her home planet of Titan with the precious dinosaur DNA, desired by her Queen. Mina looks forward to her long awaited reward- to be 'Turned'. Finally after years of servitude, she will gain her own free will and be able to live the life she wants - and at last learn what it means to love. H
